content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, welcome to Mannheim. Thank you for considering my apartment for your stay. To begin, I would like to know what your budget is for a monthly rental payment. This will help us determine if we can come to an agreement on a price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euros per month.

I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment in a quiet area with good access to public transportation. Is this apartment a good fit for me?

I am also interested in the possibility of sharing the apartment with another tenant. If so, what would the rental price be per person?
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for sharing your budget with me, Baihu Li. Based on your requirements, I believe this apartment would be a good fit for you. The apartment is located in a quiet area of Mannheim with easy access to public transportation.

Regarding sharing the apartment with another tenant, I am willing to consider this option. However, the rental price per person would depend on the specific terms of the agreement. I would need to discuss this further with you to determine the best arrangement for both of us.

If you are interested in proceeding with a shared rental agreement, we can discuss the specifics and come to an agreement on the rental price per person. Alternatively, if you prefer a solo rental arrangement, we can discuss the rental price for the entire apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would prefer a solo rental arrangement. What is the rental price for this apartment?

I am also interested in the possibility of renewing my lease for another year. If so, what would the rental price be for the next year?

Lastly, if I decide to move out before the end of my lease, what is the penalty fee?

I am happy to hear that this apartment is a good fit for me. Can we schedule a follow-up meeting to discuss the rental price and other details in more detail?
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Baihu Li. Based on our discussion, I am willing to offer you a rental price of 850 Euros per month for the entire apartment. This price includes utilities and other expenses, making it a competitive option in the Mannheim rental market.

I am also happy to inform you that if you decide to renew your lease for another year, the rental price for the next year will be the same, 850 Euros per month.

In the event that you decide to move out before the end of your lease, there will be a penalty fee of one month's rent. This fee is designed to cover any expenses incurred by me in preparing the apartment for a new tenant.

I would be happy to schedule a follow-up meeting with you to discuss the rental price and other details in more detail. Please let me know your availability, and we can arrange a convenient time for you to come and see the apartment again.
name: Heinrich Heine
